name: Satellite Squad
description:
Prototyping a game idea:

A space shooter game prototype, where you play little satellites that orbit and defend a large space ship. You can only switch the direction of the satellites and choose upgrades when you collect power ups.

Please regard:

I'm still playing around with this, the enemy succession and conditions to spawn power ups are horrible and will change in the future.

I used this free asset in this prototype:

  • Press Start 2P Font by Cody "CodeMan38" Boisclair

This project is open source, find it at:

https://github.com/hinek/SatelliteSquad
